archimate:Requirement.name: SM.2.2.8g: g) legislation or regulation related to information security (e.g. those concerning data breach notification, data privacy and industry-specific standards such as Basel III and PCI DSS)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
